works.description:
The following text was copied from http://www.praxiom.com/iso-14001-intro.htm (see our first paragraph) to http://www.celsaarmeringsstaal.com/Pdf/Celsamiljorapport_engs.pdf (see "Environmental management and Emas statement" on page 5):

“ISO 14001 is an environmental management
standard. It specifies a set of requirements
for environmental management
systems.
The purpose of this standard is to help
all types of organizations to protect the
environment, to prevent pollution, and to
improve their environmental performance.”

NOTE: On December 22, 2011, we asked them to acknowledge their source. No response.
